item.title: Prequel
item.description: A little short story about what happened Seven years ago.

item.title: MANAGER GUY
item.description: The main antagonist of the series. A powerful Wordsmith. Valerie’s personal agent and boyfriend.

item.title: THE CITY
item.description: THE CITY used to be a small town in the middle-west of Anvil Isles.

item.title: Winry
item.description: Winry Thorne. Main POV character. Valerie’s ex-girlfriend. The bassist and vocalist in Bandwitch!.

item.title: Logline
item.description: After being fired from her job and bombarded by catastrophe after catastrophe, Winry tries to get her band back together as a last resort.

item.title: Kim
item.description: Kim Ahn. The multi-instrumentalist of Bandwitch!. Character notes: Kim is a very gentle person, kind and motherly.

item.title: ACCOUNTANT GUY
item.description: Winry’s former co-worker and current suitor. A very nice guy, though a bit of a dumbus.

item.title: Character Index
item.description: Main characters: Winry Valerie Robin Kim Antagonists: Nightingale Wren MANAGER GUY Secondary characters: Ellis Lark ACCOUNTANT GUY .

item.title: Potential Episode Names
item.description: heartcore worm train (crazy train reference) the girl with the Thorne in her side .

item.title: Synopsis
item.description: After music saved Winry’s life, she promised herself to change the world with music of her own.
